content.description: <math alttext="f of x, equals, 6 minus, three fourths x, for 0 less than or equal to x, less than 4; f of x, equals, 1 plus, one eighth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, squared, for 4 less than or equal to x, less than or equal to 12; f of x, equals 3, for 12 less than x, less than or equal to 14" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mtext>for</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mtext>for</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>12</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mtext>for</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><mn>12</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>14</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: A skateboard track consists of a straight ramp followed by a curved section and a horizontal ledge. The track is modeled by the piecewise-defined function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> above, and the graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is shown in the figure above. Which of the following expressions gives the total length of the track from <math alttext="x equals 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="x equals 14" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 plus, the integral from, 0 to 12, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, negative three fourths plus, one fourth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 plus, the integral from, 0 to 12, of, open parenthesis, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, negative three fourths, close parenthesis, squared, end root, plus, the square root of 1 plus, one sixteenth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, squared, end root, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><mo>+</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="7 plus, the integral from, 4 to 12, of, the square root of 1 plus, open parenthesis, 1 plus, one eighth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, squared, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="7 plus, the integral from, 4 to 12, of, the square root of 1 plus, one sixteenth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="7 plus, the integral from, 4 to 12, of, the square root of 1 plus, one sixteenth times, open parenthesis, x minus 8, close parenthesis, squared, end root, d x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>
